title: The Prince's Game
description: There’s only one way to get a “happily-ever-after,”And that’s by winning the game.My twin sister thinks she’s so damn funny with her pranks,But I’m not laughing.Entering me into a dating reality show,The Prince’s Game,Isn’t all that hysterical.But this particular joke has quite the twist.The billionaire bachelor, Evan Mershano, has no interest in marriage.With his family breathing down his neck, he’s desperate for a way out,And I happen to be the perfect damsel to save this prince.It’s a simple play to win, and he’ll make it worth my while.But what started out as a silly farce,Just might be the fairytale we never expected.
author: Lexi C. Foss
